title: Branching Scenario Design to Enhance Engagement in Workplace E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Core job knowledge and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Creation of hands-on learning environments for enhancing science-related job performance

learning_goals: Maintain a participation rate of over 80% in branch scenario-based learning.
Over 90% of learners report safe failure experiences in decision-making scenarios reflecting real job situations.
Achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point Likert scale) in surveys measuring motivation retention during the learning period.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
